candidates.title: [tuify][giti] Redesign `giti branch delete` user experience
candidates.body:
Modified the `giti branch delete` user experience. 

- Read more about the UX from [giti design document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qSZVLuVNyjzud6IpSwvvv3g7JjL45KX74-KT8fGDhdo/edit?pli=1#heading=h.rmzwkiyje6ng) under `giti branch delete`.

candidates.title: [all][utils] Moving top level code in `utils` directory
[tuify][examples] Add quiz game example
candidates.body:
Closes issue #222.
 
Add quiz game example as the last example in the `main_interactive.rs`.

https://github.com/r3bl-org/r3bl-open-core/assets/22040032/582b463e-18c2-41e3-a0a3-a9309bce7395

candidates.title: Nazmulidris/cleanup-colors
candidates.body:
palette crate dropped support for Gradient in the latest release
which prevented its latest version to be used. So dropping it here
in favor of the colorgrad crate.

Fixes: #162

candidates.title: [tui] Remove bitflags dep, so Cargo.toml can be upgraded to latest
candidates.body:
The latest bitflags crate breaks things for modifier_keys_mask.rs.
So drop this depenedency so that Cargo.toml can be upgraded to the
latest of each dep.

Fixes: #161

candidates.title: [tui] feature : Copy Selected text in TUI
candidates.body:
The PR comprises of changes required to implement the feature where we can copy the text to the clipboard from TUI. Here, We set in a logic which takes whole text and the `SelectionMap`. We then take the RowIndex in order and then based on it extract the selection caret values from all the lines(rows). Then we pass this to clipboard crate API to copy with our system clipboard.

Another minor change which have been made is for `get_as_string()` method for SelectionMap is now using join delimeter as a newline instead of comma.

![image](https://github.com/r3bl-org/r3bl_rs_utils/assets/79367883/052642b9-7fe8-4b68-8cd1-9407ecb25737)

The same text as seen in the image gets selected to the clipboard.

Closes #147

candidates.title: [tuify] Fix bug causing render crashes
candidates.body:
- Add tests
- Rewrite logic to detect location of caret in viewport
- Add better demo / example
- Improve rendering of multi select items (don't show index)
- Bump version number for tuify to 0.1.14

Fixes: #143

candidates.title: [core] remove `reqwest` and license exception `encoding-rs`
candidates.body:
Remove the use of `reqwest` crate from the core code. Since the `encoding-rs` was dependent on the reqwest code and we were expecting an license exception for `enoding-rs`. But now we don't have reqwest, thus there is no encoding-rs in dependencies and can be safely removed from license exception.

Closes #140

candidates.title: Audit crates
candidates.body:
- [X] ansi_colours crate has to be dropped & replaced with [this](https://crates.io/crates/r3bl_ansi_color).
- [ ] This license audit step has to be added to the https://github.com/r3bl-org/r3bl_rs_utils/issues/120 work that we have planned as well.
- [X] Add an exception for three crates (unicode-indent, encoding_rs,is_ci) using (Unicode-DFS-2016, BSD-3-Clause,ISC) to deny.toml

Closes #112
